Class.name: Report.VARHistAtendimentoPaciente
Class.Description: VARHistAtendimentoPaciente HitÃ³rico de Atendimento ao Paciente
Class.ViewQuery:
SELECT
INISSUE.CustomerName as CodPaciente, $$SQLGetPacienteName^VARTRKSQL(INISSUE.CustomerName) as NomePaciente, $$getNascimento^VARINDispenseToPatient(INISSUE.CustomerName) as DataNasc, $$getCNS^VARINDispenseToPatient(INISSUE.CustomerName) as CNS, $$SQLGetDescricaoProduto^VARTRKSQL(INISSUELine.Item) as NomeProduto, INISSUELine.Item as CodProduto, $$SQLGetDescGrupoItem^VARTRKSQL($$SQLGetGrupoItem^VARTRKSQL(INISSUELine.Item)) as DescGrupoProduto, INISSUE.IssueNumber as CodDispensacao, $$SQLGetNivelAtencaoID^VARSQL(INISSUELine.Item) as NivelAtencao, $$SQLGetNivelAtencaoDesc^VARSQL(INISSUELine.Item) as DescNivelAtencao, $$SQLGetDataFormatada^VARSQL(INISSUE.FREE14) as DataDispensacao, INISSUE.FREE14 as DataDispensacaoH, $$SQLGetDescUnidadeCompleta^VARSQL(INISSUELine.Item) as Unidade, $$SQLGetGrupoItem^VARTRKSQL(INISSUELine.Item) as GrupoProduto, INISSUELINE.QtyIssued as Quantidade, $$SQLGetLocationName^VARTRKSQL(INISSUE.FromLocn) as NomeLocal, $$SQLGetOnlyDescUnit^VARSQL(INISSUELine.Item) as descUnidade, $$SQLGetNumeroProntuarioPaciente^VARSQL(INISSUE.CustomerName) as Prontuario
FROM SQLUser.INISSUE AS INISSUE INNER JOIN SQLUser.INISSUELINE AS INISSUELINE
ON INISSUE.COMPANY = INISSUELINE.COMPANY AND INISSUE.ISSUENUMBER = INISSUELINE.ISSUENUMBER
WHERE INISSUE.COMPANY = 0 AND INISSUE.TYPE = 3 AND INISSUE.CustomerName IS NOT NULL AND INISSUE.STATUS = 9
